biotools.summary: Evitar (Emerging-Virus-Targeting RNA) is a program for (1) pre-designing siRNAs/Cas13a guide RNAs against future viruses based on existing viral sequences, and (2) designing siRNAs/Cas13a guide RNAs against a single virus based on sequences of multiple strains of this virus.

bioschemas.name: Evitar
bioschemas.summary: Evitar (Emerging-Virus-Targeting RNA) is a program for (1) pre-designing siRNAs/Cas13a guide RNAs against future viruses based on existing viral sequences, and (2) designing siRNAs/Cas13a guide RNAs against a single virus based on sequences of multiple strains of this virus.
